plot: Bonobono is a simple, good-hearted sea otter who lives near a large forest. Every day he has small adventures with his two best friends, Shimarisu the mischievous squirrel and Araiguma the short-tempered raccoon. Based on the four-panel gag manga by Igarashi Mikio.
ending_theme: "Chikamichi Shitai" (近道したい) by Kyoko Suga (eps 1-23,48)
